column1: Cremation has taken place and no services are planned. A celebration of life visitation will be held from 2:00 - 4:00 p.m. on Tuesday
column8: 66606. A double marker has been placed at the Topeka Cemetery where they purchased gravesites fifty years ago
column9: before making the decision to be cremated. A little history of the couple will be chiseled in stone where loved ones may visit.
